verses.name: Genesis 50:24
verses.text: And Joseph said unto his brethren, I die: and God will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land which he sware to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.

verses.name: Genesis 50:25
verses.text: And Joseph took an oath of the children of Israel, saying, God will surely visit you, and ye shall carry up my bones from hence.

verses.name: Genesis 50:26
verses.text: So Joseph died, being an hundred and ten years old: and they embalmed him, and he was put in a coffin in Egypt.
